title: Project-Based Instructional Design for Acquiring Portuguese Gender System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Portuguese grammar and fundamental conversational skills
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment using digital devices, structured around project-based tasks applicable to real-world work

learning_goals: Learners will classify grammatical gender (masculine/feminine) of Portuguese nouns with over 90% accuracy.
Learners will apply gender agreement rules to adjectives, articles, and verbs with 85% accuracy.
Learners will naturally use gender expressions appropriate to context at least three times in real-life scenario-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
